AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the Bing Ads account.

TimePeriod.description: The date and time for the report data.

AccountName.description: The name of the Bing Ads account.

AccountNumber.description: The account number associated with the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group.

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group.

AccountStatus.description: The status of the Bing Ads account.

AdGroupStatus.description: The status of the ad group.

Network.description: The network where the ad is displayed.

AdId.description: The unique identifier for the ad.

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used for transactions.

DeviceType.description: The type of device used to view the ad.

Language.description: The language used in the campaign.

MerchantProductId.description: The unique identifier of the product set by the merchant.

Title.description: The title of the ad or product.

Brand.description: The brand associated with the product.

Spend.description: The total amount spent on advertising.

SellerName.description: The name of the product seller.

OfferLanguage.description: The language used in the product offer.

CountryOfSale.description: The country where the sale occurred.

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network where the ad is displayed.

ClickTypeId.description: The unique identifier for the click type.

TotalClicksOnAdElements.description: The total number of clicks on ad elements.

ReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for specific conversions.

BidStrategyType.description: The type of bid strategy used.

LocalStoreCode.description: The local store code of the product.

StoreId.description: The unique identifier for the store.

AssistedConversions.description: The total number of assisted conversions.

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions.

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue generated from all conversions.

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for all conversions.

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions.

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions.

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for all conversions.

ViewThroughConversions.description: The total number of view-through conversions.

GoalType.description: The type of goal set for the campaign.

QuantityBought.description: The quantity of the purchased product.

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions.

AssistedConversionsQualified.description: The number of assisted conversions that are qualified.

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of view-through conversions that are qualified.

ProductBoughtTitle.description: The title of the purchased product.

GTIN.description: The Global Trade Item Number for the product.

MPN.description: The Manufacturer Part Number of the product.

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from view-through conversions.

AssetGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the asset group.

AssetGroupName.description: The name of the asset group.

AssetGroupStatus.description: The status of the asset group.
